name: Devas vs. Asuras
summary: Devas Vs Asuras, is a Multiplayer game that draws inspiration ancient legends of india. Eons ago there existed a mystical land known as Ilavti inhabited by 9 diverse races the Devas, Asuras, Yakshas, Gandharvas, Rishis, Vanaras, Nagas, Rakshshas & Manavas. The ancients are coming back.
